channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Blue-chip stocks undercut by Trump tariff pledge — live market coverage
U.S. home-price pickup has stalled: Case-Shiller
Inflation in the U.S. is heading in the wrong direction. How troubling is that?
AI boom drives shares of sleepy Texas land firm up 200%
item.description: Texas Pacific Land Corp. owns nearly 900,000 acres in energy-rich West Texas, an area greater in size than Yosemite National Park.

item.title: Amgen shares slide as weigh-loss-drug data lag analyst expectations
With stakeholder capitalism pioneers Schwab, Dimon, and Fink nearing retirement, who will carry the torch forward?
item.description: We can start by viewing business as the very human institution that it is.

item.title: Uniswap offers biggest-ever ‘bug bounty,’ promises up to $15.5 million to those who spot code vulnerabilities
item.description: The company is asking the public to seek out vulnerabilities in its v4 protocol.

item.title: Kohl’s shares plummet 16% and Dick’s rallies 7% as retailers’ earnings roll in
Marc Andreessen doesn’t want to see anyone’s ‘whole self’ at work: ‘Act like a professional and a grownup’
item.description: It comes as a number of workplaces, like Meta and EY, have come down hard on staffers they feel aren’t acting professionally.

item.title: Pizza Hut is offering deep-fried frog pizza in China
